oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lotz, Johann Albert
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Staircase
Lotz House, staircase looking down
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Lotz designed and built this house, which is located across the street from the brick home of Fountain Branch Carter. Lotz, a skilled carpenter and German immigrant, created the interior detailing like this dramatically curved staircase.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Stairways
Walking a Fine Line
